attributes.action: to support the innocent instead of lawbreakers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: That if a burglar forcing an entry into property he did not own ,is killed or injured ,no charges would be brought by the police against the property owner ,and it would be a deterrant for burglars as they would not have any re dress in law and no legal expences incurred by the property owner

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
